description: The file defines a composable UI screen for an Expense Tracker app using Jetpack Compose. It includes state management, user interface components for displaying and editing expense items, summary cards, date navigation, and interaction handlers.

classes.name: FormState
classes.description: Data class holding the state of the form used for adding or editing expense items.

methods.name: ExpenseTrackerScreen
methods.description: Main composable displaying the expense tracker UI, managing state, and orchestrating sub-components.

methods.name: MonthHeader
methods.description: Displays the current month with navigation buttons to go to previous or next month.

methods.name: SummaryCards
methods.description: Displays cards summarizing income, expenses, and balance for the selected month.

methods.name: SummaryCard
methods.description: Displays individual summary metric in a card format.

methods.name: TransactionForm
methods.description: Form for adding or editing a transaction item, including validation and submission logic.

methods.name: CategoryRow
methods.description: Displays selectable category chips for classifying transaction items.

methods.name: TransactionList
methods.description: Lists transaction items with options to edit or delete each entry.

methods.name: hexToColor
methods.description: Converts a hex color string to a Compose Color object.
